title: Bloomberg Markets: Drybrough on Risk Management in Markets
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Drybrough on Risk Management in Markets
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Ralph Drybrough Co-Founder StratiFi Discussing how to use the VIX to take risk out of portfolios.
